contents.item: People divulge things to you that they would not divulge to anyone else.
contents.owner: Melina Marchetta, Finnikin of the Rock

contents.item: if the conditions and or circumstances are right anybody will turn against anyone...
Never trust a person more than you, when they break the trust you lost the life of happiness,it shakes the heart and gives the tears for ever
Honest people are never touchy about the matter of being trusted.
Sometimes all we have to do is to trust. Let go of things is an easy job but to stay with a strong heart full of trust is even much more important then all .
When you trust yourself, you will come out like a beautiful sunbeam through the dark clouds!

If you want a man to trust you, ask him for a favor. Most people get this part wrong. They try to win people over by offering something to them, but humans instinctively recoil from those who help them. They like the people that they help far better, even if the favor granted is as small as a cigarette.
the biggest mistake i have done is to trust YOU...
You should have trusted me. I'm really tired of people not trusting me.
a relationship without trust is like a car without gas..you can stay in it all you want, but it won't go anywhere...
if you fooled a person, don't think he or she is a fool...it means, they trusted you more than themselves...
you can't just tell someone to trust you..you gotta show them that they can trust you....

...You have knowledge, and I have skill, and between us we have...""We have the Ring of Erreth-Akbe.""Yes, that. But I thought also of another thing between us. Call it trust... That is one of its names. It is a very great thing. Though each of us alone is weak, having that we are strong, stronger than the Powers of the Dark.
contents.owner: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Tombs of Atuan

contents.item: Trust had become a commodity that few could afford.

Evan to Bethany: "Just trust me.""You say it like it's so easy.""Of course it's not.""Then how am I supposed to 'just trust' you?""Funny thing about trust...Sometimes you have to give it before you can experience it.
I've tried to make choices. You don't really trust me to.
Never trust a man with a lunatic wife in an attic," Richard told me. "And anyone named Heathcliff should make you suspicious.
Trust is like a valuable antique, once gone, it can never be replaced.
It will be a very long time before I trust you ever, ever - OK, I trust you again.
contents.owner: Daniel Handler, Why We Broke Up

contents.item: The first lie of life is to say that there is such a thing as trust. Can you truly say you even trust yourself?
contents.owner: Michelle Horst, The Land of Shadows
